review: buying amazon fire tv is great to watch my prime shows. During football season it is especially great while my husband watches football on other tv.....
author: areader

review: We love the Fire TV!  All of our favorite shows are available instantly and it's much more affordable than regular cable.  The only drawback is that I wish it had the same apps available as the kindle... Would love to have apps like Watch Disney/Disney Jr., Watch TBS, Watch ABC, etc.  available for download.  Overall, very pleased!
author: Bec

review: We have only used the Amazon Fire for a couple of weeks, but it was everything they said it was. Very easy to use, and to set up. Small enough that we just velcro stuck it to the back of the tv, no one even sees it, no big box setting out in view. The voice command is a real time saver when looking for movies or programs.
author: Denise Baatz

review: I bought this mostly because it was interesting technically. I wanted to use it mostly to watch Netflix and it works well for that. The one thing I don't like is that it automatically plays the next episode of the series I am watching, but this is probably a feature of Netflix rather than the Fire TV itself. I like the voice search, but it only gets me as far as Netflix.
author: Warren

review: Seems to work well, good movie selection easy to use. It was a gift for mothers and fathers day.excellent gift that I would recommend
author: robert wetmore

review: We are new to streaming and have been very pleased with Amazon Fire TV.  The selection is large and it is incredibly easy to use.  Even my 4 year old can do it.
